long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can browse German websites without having to fully translate the page, so you slowly learn by immersion!

Press shift while hovering over a word to:
- hear a real native German say it
- see the IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) equivalent of the word to learn how to pronounce it
- get its definitions in English

It's like having a native German sitting next to you, sounding things out for you! ðŸ¤©

You can also search for a specific word by clicking on the extension icon in the top right.
